Package net.sf.freecol.common.model.pathfinding

Class CostDeciders

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.freecol.common.model.pathfinding.CostDeciders

  • public final class CostDeciders
extends java.lang.Object
    Cost deciders to be used while finding paths.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private static class  CostDeciders.AvoidNavalDangerCostDecider
      A CostDecider to avoid naval danger.
      private static class  CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider
      A CostDecider that costs unit moves normally while avoiding other player settlements and units, and does not explore if it is trading.
      private static class  CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsCostDecider
      A CostDecider that costs unit moves normally while avoiding other player settlements.
      private static class  CostDeciders.ServerBaseCostDecider
      A CostDecider that uses server-side knowledge of where a player has explored to limit searches.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static CostDecider avoidIllegalCostDecider
      A CostDecider that costs unit moves normally.
      private static CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider avoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider
      An instance of the settlement+unit avoiding cost decider.
      private static CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsCostDecider avoidSettlementsCostDecider
      An instance of the cost decider for avoiding settlements.
      private static CostDecider serverAvoidIllegalCostDecider
      A server-side CostDecider that costs unit moves normally.
      private static CostDecider tileCostDecider
      A CostDecider that only considers the number of tiles visited when determining the cost, but differs from the trivialCostDecider in checking the legality of the move.
      private static CostDecider trivialCostDecider
      A trivial CostDecider that only considers the number of locations visited when determining cost.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static CostDecider avoidIllegal​()
      A CostDecider that returns the cost of moving across the terrain, excluding only illegal moves.
      static CostDecider avoidNavalDanger​()
      A CostDecider for avoiding using locations which have blocking enemy units or expose naval units to bombardment.
      static CostDecider avoidSettlements​()
      A CostDecider returning only the cost of moving across the terrain (no additional cost for blocking enemy units etc) but excluding settlements.
      static CostDecider avoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnits​()
      A CostDecider for avoiding using locations which have blocking enemy units on them.
      static CostDecider defaultCostDeciderFor​(Unit unit)
      Selects a default CostDecider for the given unit depending on the owner of the unit and if the unit can attack other units.
      static CostDecider getComposedCostDecider​(CostDecider... cds)
      Gets a composite cost decider composed of two or more individual cost deciders.
      static CostDecider numberOfLegalTiles​()
      A CostDecider only considering the number of tiles visited when determining the cost.
      static CostDecider numberOfTiles​()
      The trivial CostDecider.
      static CostDecider serverAvoidIllegal​()
      A CostDecider that returns the cost of moving across the terrain, excluding only illegal moves, and works correctly on the server side by refusing to consider locations unexplored by the player.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • avoidIllegalCostDecider

        private static final CostDecider avoidIllegalCostDecider
        A CostDecider that costs unit moves normally.

      • trivialCostDecider

        private static final CostDecider trivialCostDecider
        A trivial CostDecider that only considers the number of locations visited when determining cost. Totally ignores the legality of the move.

      • tileCostDecider

        private static final CostDecider tileCostDecider
        A CostDecider that only considers the number of tiles visited when determining the cost, but differs from the trivialCostDecider in checking the legality of the move.

      • serverAvoidIllegalCostDecider

        private static final CostDecider serverAvoidIllegalCostDecider
        A server-side CostDecider that costs unit moves normally.

      • avoidSettlementsCostDecider

        private static final CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsCostDecider avoidSettlementsCostDecider
        An instance of the cost decider for avoiding settlements.

      • avoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider

        private static final CostDeciders.AvoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider avoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnitsCostDecider
        An instance of the settlement+unit avoiding cost decider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CostDeciders

        public CostDeciders​()

    • Method Detail

      • getComposedCostDecider

        public static CostDecider getComposedCostDecider​(CostDecider... cds)
        Gets a composite cost decider composed of two or more individual cost deciders. The result/s are determined by the cost decider which returns the highest cost, with an ILLEGAL_MOVE result dominating.
        Parameters:
        cds - A series (two minimum) of CostDeciders to compose.
        Returns:
        A new CostDecider composed of the argument cost deciders.

      • defaultCostDeciderFor

        public static CostDecider defaultCostDeciderFor​(Unit unit)
        Selects a default CostDecider for the given unit depending on the owner of the unit and if the unit can attack other units.
        Parameters:
        unit - The Unit to choose a CostDecider for.
        Returns:
        A suitable CostDecider.

      • numberOfTiles

        public static CostDecider numberOfTiles​()
        The trivial CostDecider.
        Returns:
        The CostDecider.

      • numberOfLegalTiles

        public static CostDecider numberOfLegalTiles​()
        A CostDecider only considering the number of tiles visited when determining the cost.
        Returns:
        The CostDecider.

      • avoidIllegal

        public static CostDecider avoidIllegal​()
        A CostDecider that returns the cost of moving across the terrain, excluding only illegal moves.
        Returns:
        The CostDecider.

      • serverAvoidIllegal

        public static CostDecider serverAvoidIllegal​()
        A CostDecider that returns the cost of moving across the terrain, excluding only illegal moves, and works correctly on the server side by refusing to consider locations unexplored by the player.
        Returns:
        The CostDecider.

      • avoidSettlements

        public static CostDecider avoidSettlements​()
        A CostDecider returning only the cost of moving across the terrain (no additional cost for blocking enemy units etc) but excluding settlements.
        Returns:
        The CostDecider.

      • avoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnits

        public static CostDecider avoidSettlementsAndBlockingUnits​()
        A CostDecider for avoiding using locations which have blocking enemy units on them. Paths containing an enemy settlement are considered illegal, and so are paths where the next move has an enemy unit on it.
        Returns:
        The CostDecider.

      • avoidNavalDanger

        public static CostDecider avoidNavalDanger​()
        A CostDecider for avoiding using locations which have blocking enemy units or expose naval units to bombardment.
        Returns:
        The CostDecider.
